Darkfate used his commm link again in a private frecuency, just 
Killfest and Drillbit could recive it "Drilbit where's the Old 
PRedacon base?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Richard Allen" <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Sorry Killfest, forgot you wern't around when we lived there. I'll 
> transmit the location," he replyes via commlink. The transmites the 
> location.
> He then heads out towards the old cave.
